Title: Clarifies the standard of care for animals held in or being transported by animal shelters; repealer
Summary: Clarifies the standard of care for animals held in or being transported by animal shelters including the length of time and conditions such animal may be exposed to.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to standards of care for animals held in, or being transported by, animal shelters; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
